name: Tack: Classic (Beta)
description:
Survive. Loot. Explore.
All in a classic-style shooter.
It's 2042. The world has been taken over are there are only select humans and zombies living. Explore, fight and loot, all in a classic-style world. 
Beta starts June 2022, full release in October-December 2022. From late-July to early-August, the game will no longer be free.

2022, Crocodile Digital Entertainment. The CDE Logo, Tack logo and screenshots are among our unregistered trademarks in the United Kingdom and other countries. All rights reserved. 

See CDE Customer Support for help.
